description.message: This extension add some functionalities to Bitbucket

settingsFirst.message: Something went wrong, maybe you didn't configure properly the extension, or maybe you are not admin. Please first visit the options page to double check the settings

sinceRecord.message: new comment(s) since last recorded visit

prHaveChanged.message: We detected $count$ pull requests have changed since the approval. We are removing the APPROVAL state.

disableStateOpen.message: Do not show PR in OPEN state

disableStatePending.message: Do not show PR in PENDING state

disableStateMerged.message: Do not show PR in MERGED state

disableStateDeclined.message: Do not show PR in DECLINED state

disableStateNeedsWork.message: Do not show PR in NEEDS_WORK state

disableStateApproved.message: Do not show PR in APPROVED state

updateCredentials.message: Please open the settings and update your credentials.

updateServerUrl.message: Server not reachable: please check the settings
